name: Beneath The Darkness
description:
Theme: Beneath The Surface

Original Descriptions:

A Shoot 'em Up game. 

Synopsis: 
The sun went out quicker than everyone expected. Mankind fled into the caves and built complexes and stayed near geothermal locations to survive. Journey through the life of Karen as her brother, Kevin gets kidnapped by triads within the complex beneath the surface fo the Earth. Will they survive this? Find out as you journey through a lost world that was rid of light. 

Made by me (Nicholas Chan) and my artist friend, Isaac Soong :)
